content.eamr: ( ing-0 "1 (15 ounce) can chickpeas (garbanzo beans), drained" )
( ing-2 "1/2 cup drained marinated artichoke hearts" )

content.text: Quaker Quakes Ranch or Sour Cream and Onion Flavor Rice Snacks
content.eamr: ( ing-6 "Quaker Quakes Ranch or Sour Cream and Onion Flavor Rice Snacks" )

content.text: 0) Combine all ingredients except parsley and Quaker Rice Snacks in work bowl of food processor.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Combine"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( "all ingredients except parsley and Quaker Rice Snacks"@11:64 / FOOD
			:ref ( ing-0 )
			:ref ( ing-1 )
			:ref ( ing-2 )
			:ref ( ing-3 )
			:ref ( ing-4 )
		)
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "work bowl of food processor"@68:95 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Cover and refrigerate until ready to serve.
5) Dip or spread each Quakes Ranch Flavor Rice Snack with hummus.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Dip"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-6 "each Quakes Ranch Flavor Rice Snack"@17:52 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "hummus"@58:64 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-5-1 "spread"@10:16 / AC )
)
